Test Name: T-Cell Intracellular Antigen 1 (TIA-1) Immunostain, Bone Marrow
Purpose: To detect the presence and distribution of T-Cell Intracellular Antigen 1 (TIA-1) in bone marrow tissue for diagnostic evaluation.
Container: Glass microscope slides containing fixed bone marrow tissue
Equipment: Microscope, antigen retrieval system (e.g., microwave or pressure cooker), detection system (HRP-conjugated kit)
